Articles.Content:
This is a game in which you change 1 event in history, describe the entire order of events that occurs due to that change (domino effect), and come up with the pros and cons of living in that alternate universe. Then, the next poster rates on a scale of 0 - 100 how much they would like it in that universe.

Example#1:

Player #1:

Adolf Hitler became a very successful painter = Went down in history as extremely skilled painter = Never went into politics = WWII as we know it never happened = Soviet union started it's reign of tension against the U.S early = Massive, even larger war occurs = WWII happens after all = World is devastated, america is defeated = Soviet union takes over world.

Pro: All the work gives you enormous muscles.

Con: ***Communism.***

Player #2: 0 / 100, I hate communism!

I will begin.

Apophis hit Earth = Earth is devistated = 99.98% of all life is wiped out = humanity lives in bunkers, while the surface is a dark, black-fogged wasteland of radiation and ash = KSP never existed

Pro: Kind of like Fallout!

Con: No KSP.

0/100- I'd be dead.

Saturn rockets still being built + Shuttle not developed = manned program throughout 70s, space stations galore, etc.

Pros: Still flying. Lots of stations. No shuttle.

Cons: I can't think of any.

100 / 100

Best reality ever.

Meteorite never killed dinosaurs = Earth's flora and fauna developed much differently = Atmosphere is 25% nitrogen, 75% oxygen = Lizard men evolve, create civilisation = They are much more mentally stable then us = They easily create utopian civilisation with no problems whatsoever.

Pros: Utopia! Better technology! Everyone's nice!

Cons: Humanity doesn't exist, neither does its history or KSP.

50/100 to dead to appreciate, but someone like me but as a lizard man might be around.

Walt Disney is still alive until 2060 = Frozen was never made = FANF also never made = KSP movie created = Disney does not buy lucasfilm = games workshop buys Disney = Space Marines movies made.

Pros: really? you want to see the pros in that?

cons: probably some other annoying Disney films made before games workshop buys them.

1/1 yippee

hitler was killed in a plane accident during his service in World War One = no world war 2 = no missiles = no space program= no computer no cellphone or any advanced technologies we have today

pros millions saved

cons are listed above

0/100

No KSP, no envy.

Soviet union beat U.S to moon =Soviet union incredibly famous = U.S demoralized = No NASA = America put it's funding to military = America takes over entire world with massive army = Capitalism & freedom everywhere

Pros: Everyone is free, world is awesome

Cons: Corrupt government, commies were first to the moon, technology developed late, and KSP never had time to be created.
Just a note stop with the communist stuff

NaN/100

Dinosaurs never go extinct.

Pros: We look cool with scales, claws, and wings.

Cons: Everything wants to kill us.

0/100; Hate corrupt government

Columbia survives its reentry, space shuttle program continues, success of ISS allows President Bush with the huevos to make a push for Mars, Earth gets to Mars.

Pros: Space Shuttles still flying, We get to Mars, no lives lost

Cons: none that I can think of

100/100 because NASA has funding.

Yuri Gagarin does not die in a plane crash and the Russians land on the moon and Yuri is the first Russian on the moon.

Pros: Someone else landed on the moon.

Cons: none.

10/10 because not merica

during ww2 hitter takes over Britain the enigma code isn't cracked Germans win the master race is created 

pros the ination game isn't made

con look up

-100 / 100

Let's not take it there, please. That will kill this game.

The next poster dies in an extremely horrific and horrible way 3 minutes prior to making their post = They never made their post.

Pro: None.

Con: You're dead.

1/100. I don't want to die!

colonies don't get unhappy- america is not made- brittain takes over the world-no more spanish holidays- less no-work days-ksp 1.0 released eirlier

pros:ksp 1.0 is eirlier

cons: everybody is acting like the brittish.

> 
> -100 / 100
> Let's not take it there, please. That will kill this game.
> 
> The next poster dies in an extremely horrific and horrible way 3 minutes prior to making their post = They never made their post.
> 
> Pro: None.
> 
> Con: You're dead.

Dead/Alive superposition of states. I am either dead or alive and this post may or may not exist, and thus the score for the situation above exists and not exists at the same time and can vary anywhere between negative infinity to infinity.

Leonardo da Vinci managed to perfect flying machine invention -> aerospace technology got advanced by a few hundreds years -> WWII was fought in space -> Kessler syndrome causing space to be inaccessible for us ever since then.

Pro: lots more space stuff.

Con: gotta do space clean up

90/100

Not my problem

the first humans die

1/10

im a human

the N1 rocket is successful = Soviet Russia lands on the moon first = America extends the space race to mars = somebody lands humans on mars

Pros: history becomes a lot more interesting

Cons: Kessler apocalypse happens much earlier, Communist Russia still exists
100/100 because better space ships earlier

0/100 nothing, so FNAF still exists.

FNAF is never made=FNAF 2 is never made=FNAF 3 is never made.

pros: all the FNAF not made

cons: none?

0/100 I like FNAF.

Tokyo was atom-bombed during WWII = Japan was wiped out entirely = Korea took the rest of it over = When Korea split, North Korea got most of the land Japan had = Much more military prowess = DPRK takes everything over

Pro: None.

Con: Millions more people were killed, all the tech. advancements Japan made since WWII weren't made, Anime / Manga doesn't exist, and North Korea runs the world.

1/10 you neem no death note ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

your dad dies

pros none

Cons your dads dead

1/100 Don't like that.

Classic Rock and Grunge and Metal are still popular; Pop never happens; The subliminal messages to act like the stereotypes never get to the teens; They become much more mature.

Pros: Good Music! Mature Teens!

Cons: NONE

100/100 Great timeline.

2001 Timeline. But without the monoliths.

Pros: Lots of SPACE!

Cons: No monoliths...

6/10

The United States becomes a monarchy and focused on military only, not anything else. They win the war of 1812 and expanded into the Americas.

Pros: Big empire

Cons: No food, no KSP.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-15T01:46:25Z" title="04/15/2015 01:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 15, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**

5/10 Probably not much different, but no KSP. Also, the USA did win the War of 1812...

Apollo 1 fire happened, but the crew survived. Block II ends up happening anyways, Gus Grissom lands on the Moon. 

Pros: No Apollo 1 fire.

Cons: Probably same as ours.

8/10 Nobody dies!

Math never discovered.

Pros: Non that I know of.

Cons: Everything.
